_sText:
A remake of my old abandoned map new layout and fresh brushwork
this is the first beta so its not perfect
Features:
HDR
OVERVIEW
64 spawns!
---update---V1.4 Final
added some ambient sounds and removed some dev textures I found
---update---V1.3
tried to balance map more and fixed a couple errors
---update--- V1.2
added another path in the tunnels also tweaked the textures and lighting
added a couple more random props and crates
---micro update--- V1.1
I put a fade effect on the grass to help optimization
added a couple boxes nothing major.

to do list---
work out ambient sounds
fix some doors a couple open at the knob not the hinge :s
spam dirty decals/overlays everywhere
